title: An Impressive Warriors Title, Curry’s Pantheon Jump, and Tatum’s Finals Swoon With Joe House
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Joe House to discuss the Warriors defeating the Celtics to become the 2022 NBA champions, Steph Curry’s Finals MVP performance, why the Andrew Wiggins trade may have swung the series, Warriors head coach Steve Kerr, takeaways for the Celtics, and more.

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Joe House
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
